1337610.name: The Last Warrior
1337610.description:
A game of exploration and survival, solve puzzles, find valuable items and survive the challenges of each area of ​​the forest, and this is your way out of the forest alive.

FEATURES

  • Learn to manage your time well.
    You will have a time limit to escape all the challenges of the forest, if that time is over, it's over, you will be killed by the forest Gamesh
  • Early Access containing the first area of ​​the forest and 10 levels for you to try to escape.
    In this first version, you will have access to ten levels with varied mechanics so that you can discover how to escape the forest as quickly as possible.
  • SpeedRun mode
    Global scoreboard to find out who wins the fastest forest challenges.[/]

    Are you prepared to face the challenges of the Forest and get away in time?
1337610.supported_languages:
葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
